channel.name: DHS COVID Inhouse HL7 Export

properties.select:
DECLARE @start_date DATE = GETDATE()-7; DECLARE @end_date DATE = GETDATE()+3; DECLARE @SFT1 VARCHAR(20),@SFT2 VARCHAR(20),@SFT3 VARCHAR(20)
SELECT TOP 1 @SFT1 = REPLACE(description, ' Package Version',''), @SFT2 = version, @SFT3 = REPLACE(description, 'Package Version','EHR') FROM version WHERE product_id='PKG' ORDER BY modify_timestamp DESC
SELECT o.seq_no --MSH , l.state + ' DHS' AS [MSH.3.1] , 'NextCare' AS [MSH.4.1] , pe.practice_id AS [MSH.4.2] , l.state + ' DHS' AS [MSH.5.1] , l.state + ' DHS' AS [MSH.6.1] , 'ORU' AS [MSH.9.1] , 'R01' AS [MSH.9.2] , 'ORU_R01' AS [MSH.9.3] , IIF(DB_NAME() LIKE '%PROD%', 'P', 'T') AS [MSH.11.1]
--PID , pt.med_rec_nbr AS [PID.3.1] , p.last_name AS [PID.5.1] , p.first_name AS [PID.5.2] , p.middle_name AS [PID.5.3] , p.date_of_birth AS [PID.7.1] , p.sex AS [PID.8.1] , p_race.race_id [PID.10.1] , p_race.race AS [PID.10.2] , p_race.race_system AS [PID.10.3]
, p.address_line_1 AS [PID.11.1] , p.address_line_2 AS [PID.11.2] , p.city AS [PID.11.3] , p.state AS [PID.11.4] , CASE LEN(p.zip) WHEN 5 THEN p.zip WHEN 9 THEN STUFF(p.zip,6,0,'-') ELSE LEFT(p.zip,5) END AS [PID.11.5] , '' AS [PID.11.6] --p.country , '' AS [PID.11.9] --p.county
, IIF(len(p.home_phone)=10, LEFT(p.home_phone,3),'') AS [PID.13.6] , IIF(len(p.home_phone)=10, RIGHT(p.home_phone,7),'') AS [PID.13.7]
, p_eth.ethnicity_id [PID.22.1] , p_eth.ethnicty AS [PID.22.2] , p_eth.ethnicity_system AS [PID.22.3] , p.expired_ind AS [PID.30.1]
--PV1 , pe.location_id AS [PV1.3.1] , prv.national_provider_id AS [PV1.7.1] , prv.last_name AS [PV1.7.2] , prv.first_name AS [PV1.7.3] , pe.enc_id AS [PV1.19.1] , FORMAT(pe.enc_timestamp,'yyyyMMddhhmmss') AS [PV1.44.1] , pe.enc_nbr AS [PV1.50.1]
--ORC , 'IH.' + pe.practice_id + '.' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),pe.enc_nbr) AS [ORC.2.1] , o.seq_no AS [ORC.3.1] , o.actStatus AS [ORC.5.1] , FORMAT(o.modify_timestamp,'yyyyMMddhhmmss-0700') AS [ORC.9.1] , o.completedBy AS [ORC.10.1] , order_prv.national_provider_id AS [ORC.12.1] , order_prv.last_name AS [ORC.12.2] , order_prv.first_name AS [ORC.12.3] , pr.practice_name AS [ORC.17.1] , l.location_name AS [ORC.21.1] , l.clia_id AS [ORC.21.3] , l.address_line_1 AS [ORC.22.1] , l.address_line_2 AS [ORC.22.2] , l.city AS [ORC.22.3] , l.state AS [ORC.22.4] , CASE LEN(l.zip) WHEN 5 THEN l.zip WHEN 9 THEN STUFF(l.zip,6,0,'-') END AS [ORC.22.5]
, IIF(len(l.phone)=10, LEFT(l.phone,3),'') AS [ORC.23.6] , IIF(len(l.phone)=10, RIGHT(l.phone,7),'') AS [ORC.23.7] , l.extension AS [ORC.23.8]
, order_prv.address_line_1 AS [ORC.24.1] , order_prv.address_line_2 AS [ORC.24.2] , order_prv.city AS [ORC.24.3] , order_prv.state AS [ORC.24.4] , CASE LEN(order_prv.zip) WHEN 5 THEN order_prv.zip WHEN 9 THEN STUFF(order_prv.zip,6,0,'-') END AS [ORC.24.5]
--OBR , 'IH.' + pe.practice_id + '.' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),pe.enc_nbr) AS [OBR.2.1] , o.seq_no AS [OBR.3.1] , o.actcode AS [OBR.4.1] , o.actTextDisplay AS [OBR.4.2] , 'LN' AS [OBR.4.3] , FORMAT(CONVERT(DATETIME, o.orderedDate) + CONVERT(DATETIME,o.orderedTime), 'yyyyMMddhhmmss') AS [OBR.6.1] , FORMAT(CONVERT(DATETIME, o.receivedDate) + CONVERT(DATETIME,o.receivedTime), 'yyyyMMddhhmmss') AS [OBR.7.1]
, IIF(len(order_prv.phone)=10, LEFT(order_prv.phone,3),'') AS [OBR.17.6] , IIF(len(order_prv.phone)=10, RIGHT(order_prv.phone,7),'') AS [OBR.17.7] , order_prv.phone_ext AS [OBR.17.8] , FORMAT(CONVERT(DATETIME, o.receivedDate) + CONVERT(DATETIME,o.receivedTime), 'yyyyMMddhhmmss') AS [OBR.22.1] , o.actStatus AS [OBR.25.1]
--OBX , o.actcode AS [OBX.3.1] , ISNULL(o.obsValue,o.obsInterpretation) AS [OBX.5.1] , CASE WHEN ISNULL(o.obsValue,o.obsInterpretation) LIKE '%positive%' THEN 'A' ELSE 'N' END AS [OBX.8.1] , o.actStatus AS [OBX.11.1] , FORMAT(CONVERT(DATETIME, o.completedDate) + CONVERT(DATETIME,o.completedTime), 'yyyyMMddhhmmss') AS [OBX.14.1] , FORMAT(CONVERT(DATETIME, o.obtainedDate) + CONVERT(DATETIME,o.obtainedTime), 'yyyyMMddhhmmss') AS [OBX.19.1] --OBX-23.6 RE "this can be hardcoded to ""CLIA&2.16.840.1.113883.4.7&ISO"" --also add OBX-23.13 as ""XX""
--AOE , ISNULL(pu2.opt_first_test,3) AS 'OBX[1].5.1' , ISNULL(pu2.opt_emp_health,3) AS 'OBX[2].5.1' , ISNULL(pu2.opt_sympt_cdc,3) AS 'OBX[3].5.1' , ISNULL(pu2.txt_date_symp_on,'') AS 'OBX[4].5.1' , ISNULL(pu2.opt_hospital,3) AS 'OBX[5].5.1' , ISNULL(pu2.opt_icu,3) AS 'OBX[6].5.1' , ISNULL(pu2.opt_res_cc,3) AS 'OBX[7].5.1' , ISNULL(pu2.opt_pregnant,3) AS 'OBX[8].5.1'
--SPM , o.seq_no AS [SPM.2.2.1] , l.location_name AS [SPM.2.2.2] , l.clia_id AS [SPM.2.2.3] , FORMAT(CONVERT(DATETIME, o.obtainedDate) + CONVERT(DATETIME,o.obtainedTime), 'yyyyMMddhhmmss') AS [SPM.17.1] , FORMAT(CONVERT(DATETIME, o.obtainedDate) + CONVERT(DATETIME,o.obtainedTime), 'yyyyMMddhhmmss') AS [SPM.18.1]
--SFT , @SFT1 AS [SFT.1.1] , @SFT2 AS [SFT.2.1] , @SFT3 AS [SFT.3.1]
FROM practice pr (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN patient_encounter pe (NOLOCK) ON pr.practice_id=pe.practice_id INNER JOIN provider_mstr prv (NOLOCK) ON pe.rendering_provider_id=prv.provider_id INNER JOIN person p (NOLOCK) ON pe.person_id=p.person_id INNER JOIN patient pt (NOLOCK) ON pe.practice_id=pt.practice_id AND pe.person_id=pt.person_id LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT iml.external_rec_id as ethnicity_id, RTRIM(LTRIM(ml.mstr_list_item_desc)) as ethnicty, x.person_id, es.external_system_name AS ethnicity_system FROM person_ethnicity_xref x (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN mstr_lists ml (NOLOCK) on x.ethnicity_item_id=ml.mstr_list_item_id INNER JOIN intrf_mstr_lists iml (NOLOCK) ON ml.mstr_list_item_id=iml.internal_rec_id AND iml.code_type='ethnicity' INNER JOIN external_system es (NOLOCK) on iml.external_system_id=es.external_system_id WHERE x.ethnicity_order=1 AND es.external_system_name='CDC' ) p_eth ON p.person_id=p_eth.person_id LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT iml.external_rec_id as race_id, RTRIM(LTRIM(ml.mstr_list_item_desc)) as race, x.person_id, es.external_system_name AS race_system FROM person_race_xref x (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN mstr_lists ml (NOLOCK) on x.race_item_id=ml.mstr_list_item_id INNER JOIN intrf_mstr_lists iml (NOLOCK) ON ml.mstr_list_item_id=iml.internal_rec_id AND iml.code_type='race' INNER JOIN external_system es (NOLOCK) on iml.external_system_id=es.external_system_id WHERE x.race_order=1 AND es.external_system_name='CDC' ) p_race ON p.person_id=p_race.person_id INNER JOIN order_ o (NOLOCK) ON pe.enc_id=o.encounterID INNER JOIN location_mstr l (NOLOCK) ON pe.location_id=l.location_id LEFT OUTER JOIN provider_mstr order_prv (NOLOCK) ON o.orderedByKey=order_prv.provider_id LEFT OUTER JOIN pos_neg_results_U0002_ pu2 (NOLOCK) ON o.encounterID=pu2.enc_id WHERE pe.practice_id IN ('0002','0005','0008','0010') AND o.actcode IN ('U0002','COVID19Rapid') AND o.actStatus IN ('completed') AND pe.enc_timestamp BETWEEN @start_date AND @end_date AND ISNULL(ISNULL(o.obsValue,o.obsInterpretation),'')<>'' AND ISNULL(o.chk_scanreport,0)=0
properties.update: UPDATE order_ SET chk_scanreport=1 WHERE seq_no = ${seq_no}

org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Immutable.right: "SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) RdRp gene [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection"
"SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) RdRp gene [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection"
"94500-6^SARS coronavirus 2 RNA [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe^LN"
"94500-6^SARS coronavirus 2 RNA [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe^LN"

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.name: Copy OBX[0] fields to OBX[1 - 8]
SPM-4 Specimen Source
REST API AUTH
remove EVN segment
MSH-4 Sending Facility
MSH-7 DateTime of Message
PID-3 Patient Identifiers
PID-10 Race
OBX[1]-17
OBX[0-8]-23
Delete AoE "symptom onset" OBX[4]-5.1 if empty

channel.preprocessingScript: // Modify the message variable below to pre process data return message;
